description: Returns the TCG x86 default CRTM PCRs for SHA256 Bank
name: CRTMx86

description: Returns the TCG x86 default core CRTM+SRTM PCRs for SHA256 Bank
name: CoreCRTM+SRTMx86

description: Returns the configuration PCRs for x86 UEFI Systems: CRTM, UEFI Images, Boot loader and UEFI secure boot keys
name: ConfigurationCRTM+SRTMx86

description: Returns the TCG x86 default SRTM PCRs for SHA256 Bank
name: SRTMx86

description: Returns the Grub PCRs for SHA256 bank
name: GrubPCRs

description: Returns the TCG x86 default UEFI Bootloader PCRs for SHA256 bank
name: UEFIBootloaderx86

description: Returns the Intel TXT DRTM PCRs
name: DRTMTXTx86

description: Returns the Linux Integrity Measurement Architecture default PCR 10
name: IMADefault

description: Obtains the UEFI Eventlog from securityfs
name: UEFIEventlog

description: Obtain the Intel TXT Txt-stat log
name: TXT-Stat

description: Obtain the Intel TXT ACM info
name: TXTACMInfo

description: NOTPM Test null claim - this returns a test value for debugging purposes only
name: NOTPM

description: Obtains system information, eg: platform, O/S etc
name: SystemInfo

description: Obtains firmware information, eg: exposed UEFI variables
name: FirmwareInfo
